cards.name: Happy birthday!
cards.description: Today is your birthday. You collect $10 from each player.

cards.name: Sunny Day
cards.description: Finally, a sunny day at Cornell! Have a free $5. Maybe you can buy a matcha latte from Libe with it.

cards.name: Ithaca Drivers
cards.description: You got into a car accident. Pay $50 to fix your car.

cards.name: Big Spender
cards.description: You got really hungry and spent all of your BRBs on chili at Trillium. Pay $100.

cards.name: Financial Aid
cards.description: Financial aid packages are released today! Take $100.

cards.name: Generous Donor
cards.description: You're in a good mood and decide to buy boba for everyone. Give $10 to each player.

cards.name: Why isn't there parking on this campus??
cards.description: You got caught in an illegal parking spot. Womp Womp. Pay $100 to the powers that be.

cards.name: Slope Day Pregame
cards.description: Someone had the bright idea to drag everyone to a slope day pregame concert. All players pay $90.

cards.name: Summer Class
cards.description: You enrolled in a summer class. Pay $200.

cards.name: Cornell Pay Day
cards.description: It's Thursday! You collect your TA paycheck of $150.

cards.name: First Apartment
cards.description: You moved into your first apartment! The richest player is your roommate, and you each pay $15 for Ithaca trash tags. If you're the richest player, you have a studio! Fork up the $30 yourself.

cards.name: SAFC
cards.description: The SAFC finally refunded your club expenses. Take $50.

cards.name: Ryan Lombardi
cards.description: Ryan Lombardi sighting! Pay $10 for his autograph and a selfie.

cards.name: Avoid Tablers
cards.description: You just walked through ho plaza without getting harassed into buying something. You saved $10!

cards.name: Finance Bro
cards.description: You successfully became treasurer of your club. Sneakily steal $1000.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune!
cards.description: Spin the Wheel of Fortune to win a random sum of money!

cards.name: The Socialist Agenda
cards.description: The richest player will distribute their excess wealth evenly across all other players. Repent, scum!
